detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Calf-length dress in a linen and cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with hole embroidery, a deep V-neck and ties with tassels at the ends.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.

Shoes in imitation leather with contrasting colour heel caps, a padded edge and tongue and closed lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester. Fluted soles for a good grip.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.

prod_name: ED Hudson wide leg HW denim
detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Jacket in woven fabric with shoulder pads, notch lapels and buttons at the front. Chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Satin lining.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and short slits at the hems.
Soft, double-layered hairband with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.

Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Trims in contrasting colour jersey around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Blouse with long puff sleeves and gathered elastication to create a gently draped effect at the cuffs. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam with wide smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Shirt jacket in jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a fake fly. Front pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets and elasticated hems. Relaxed fit.
Mesh jacket with reversible sequins, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Hat in soft felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Lined. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Fitted jumper in a soft, airy, fine-knit cashmere blend with extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a belt. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
Small comfort blanket in soft velour and jersey with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a padded edge, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, chunky metal chain necklace with large pendants of approx. 7 cm. Adjustable length 52-59 cm.
Short cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Hi-top canvas trainers with a lightly padded shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbing at the cuffs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Adjustable bracelets in patterned fabric with a metal pendant.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Super skinny fit.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with decorative, sparkly stone buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and a lined, wrapover flounce at the hem.
Skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Seam just above the knee and a flared flounce to the hem. Long at the back and slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a cotton weave with short cap sleeves and a gathered, elasticated neckline.
Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Lined.
Set with a bracelet and necklace of chunky, rounded metal chain with a trigger clasp. Length of bracelet approx. 21 cm. Length of necklace approx. 56 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a coloured stripe down the sides. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Dress in a slightly stretchy weave with an A-line skirt. Narrow shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets.

Rain jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with smocking and a small frill trim at the top, shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow and elasticated hems with a small frill trim.
Leggings in checked, stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist and intarsia motif.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Slip-on trainers in fabric with a decorative bow at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with double-layered flutter sleeves that fall in soft pleats over the shoulders. Elasticated seam at the waist with narrow ties at the sides. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 12 pairs of studs, three pairs with pendants and one pair of hoop earrings. Size from 0.2 cm to 3 cm.
Fitted tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and straight, gently tapered legs.
Treggings in a stretch, denim-look cotton blend with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Hairband in patterned cotton jersey.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with pleats and a sewn-on tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing for optimum fit.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and a grosgrain loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, cold shoulder top in a patterned, crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a frill trim at the top.
